Common methods¶

Introduction¶

The module heatcommonmethods contains functions required in many heat transfer problems.

  1. Calculation of internal energy change

  2. Calculation of log mean temperature difference (LMTD)

  3. Calculation of Reynolds number

  4. Calculation of Prandtl number

  5. Calculation of overall heat transfer coefficient
